name: Sortedam Ventures
overview:
We make Venture Technology investments in early stage startups. We commit competencies and resources to bring web and mobile services from idea to market.

HOW IT WORKS To the entrepreneur it means that we serve as technological lead, in charge of architecture and technology. We take part in the overall commercial strategy, and help in drawing the game plan and sharpening the offering. And we manage the development roadmap, interface design and programming of the service. In short, we take on the CTO’s responsibilities.

Additionally we facilitate office space, administration and a community of entrepreneurs and advisers. OUR CORE BELIEFS First, we fight complexity. Second, we prefer proven over new. We call it simple and black.

Simple means cutting to the bone. We believe in offering distilled functionality that can be communicated, comprehended and appreciated by users quickly.

Black means the safe choice. We value the certainty of proven technologies and components that do not add unnecessary risks or barriers to use.
